segment.source: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image

segment.source: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image

segment.source: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image
segment.target: Deploying the DaRT Recovery Image

segment.source: After you have created the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) file that contains the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 recovery image, you can deploy the DaRT 8.0 recovery image throughout your enterprise so that it is available to end users and help desk workers.
segment.target: After you have created the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) file that contains the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 recovery image, you can deploy the DaRT 8.0 recovery image throughout your enterprise so that it is available to end users and help desk workers.

segment.source: There are four supported methods that you can use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: There are four supported methods that you can use to deploy the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: To review the advantages and disadvantages of each method, see Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image.
segment.target: To review the advantages and disadvantages of each method, see Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image.

segment.source: Burn the ISO image file to a CD or DVD by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard
segment.target: Burn the ISO image file to a CD or DVD by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard

segment.source: Save the contents of the ISO image file to a USB Flash Drive (UFD) by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard
segment.target: Save the contents of the ISO image file to a USB Flash Drive (UFD) by using the DaRT Recovery Image wizard

segment.source: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy as a remote partition that is available to end-user computers
segment.target: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy as a remote partition that is available to end-user computers

segment.source: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy in the recovery partition of a new Windows 8 installation
segment.target: Extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image and deploy in the recovery partition of a new Windows 8 installation

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: The DaRT Recovery Image Wizard provides the option to burn the image to a CD, DVD or UFD, but the other methods of saving and deploying the recovery image require additional steps that involve tools that are not included in DaRT.
segment.target: The DaRT Recovery Image Wizard provides the option to burn the image to a CD, DVD or UFD, but the other methods of saving and deploying the recovery image require additional steps that involve tools that are not included in DaRT.

segment.source: Some guidance and links for these other methods are provided in this section.
segment.target: Some guidance and links for these other methods are provided in this section.

segment.source: Deploy the DaRT recovery image as part of a recovery partition
segment.target: Deploy the DaRT recovery image as part of a recovery partition

segment.source: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a recovery partition in a Windows 8 image.
segment.target: After you have finished running the DaRT Recovery Image wizard and created the recovery image, you can extract the boot.wim file from the ISO image file and deploy it as a recovery partition in a Windows 8 image.

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as Part of a Recovery Partition

segment.source: Deploy the DaRT recovery image as a remote partition
segment.target: Deploy the DaRT recovery image as a remote partition

segment.source: You can host the recovery image on a central network boot server, such as Windows Deployment Services, and allow users or support staff to stream the image to computers on demand.
segment.target: You can host the recovery image on a central network boot server, such as Windows Deployment Services, and allow users or support staff to stream the image to computers on demand.

segment.source: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition
segment.target: How to Deploy the DaRT Recovery Image as a Remote Partition

segment.source: Other resources for deploying the DaRT recovery image
segment.target: Other resources for deploying the DaRT recovery image
